DataElement.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Condition Record Information Source Type Code PCORnet CDM Code
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events._A coded value specifying the kind of system or data collection from which the record of the activity was derived.:A state of being, such as a state of health._Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events._A coded value specifying the origination source of the entity._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection._A coded value specifying the kind of system or data collection from which the record of the activity was derived._A coded value specifying the origination source of the entity.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Disease or Disorder Record Information Source Type Code
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.:Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events._A coded value specifying the kind of system or data collection from which the record of the activity was derived.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A definite pathologic process with a characteristic set of signs and symptoms. It may affect the whole body or any of its parts, and its etiology, pathology, and prognosis may be known or unknown.

Concepts.definition: Any abnormal condition of the body or mind that causes discomfort, dysfunction, or distress to the person affected or those in contact with the person. The term is often used broadly to include injuries, disabilities, syndromes, symptoms, deviant behaviors, and atypical variations of structure and function.

Property.preferredDefinition: Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events._A coded value specifying the kind of system or data collection from which the record of the activity was derived.

Concepts.definition: Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events.
A coded value specifying the kind of system or data collection from which the record of the activity was derived.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Specification of human conditions relevant to cancer. This includes observations, test results, history, and other concepts relevant to characterization of human cancer-related conditions. Non-neoplastic conditions of interest are also included.

ValueDomain.preferredName: PCORnet Common Data Model Condition Record Information Source Type Code
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A data model designed to standardize PCORnet data._A state of being, such as a state of health._Anything (e.g., a document) providing permanent evidence of or information about past events._A coded value specifying the origination source of the entity._A symbol or combination of symbols which is assigned to the members of a collection.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._The primary reason for a patient visit.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
The primary reason for a patient visit.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: To take, obtain, or receive from a source; having been determined by mathematical computation.

Concepts.definition: The source from which something comes or issues; to take, obtain, or receive from a source.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A list of health problems or conditions compiled through healthcare encounters.

Concepts.definition: A list of health problems or conditions compiled through healthcare encounters.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

Concepts.definition: Information regarding the subject is unknown or inaccessible at this time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 1/25/23 added alt name for ticket number CADSR0001948 for CCTG cjl.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An algorithm designed to identify health conditions as defined by the National Patient-Centered Clinical Research Network.

Concepts.definition: An algorithm designed to identify health conditions as defined by the National Patient-Centered Clinical Research Network.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.: A short textual account; having provided a short account.: A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.
A short textual account; having provided a short account.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: An official written record of names or events or transactions.: A group of individuals, identified by a common characteristic.

Concepts.definition: An official written record of names or events or transactions.
A group of individuals, identified by a common characteristic.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.

Concepts.definition: Not known, observed, recorded; or reported as unknown by the data contributor.
